duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute the store’s community strategy through engaging with the community, relationship building, and supporting product seeding and attending local studios.
Establish and manage local key relationships to increase new guest acquisition and guest retention.
Identify future Ambassador or partner opportunities to increase the store’s standing as a community hub.
Connect with guests, provide technical product education, and incorporate omnichannel programs into the guest experience.
Attend, support, and/or host local and regional Community events.
Execute product seeding strategy through community partners and Ambassadors.
Review community relevant business data and metrics to identify and share insights and recommendations with store leadership.
Contribute to a respectful and inclusive team environment by welcoming and celebrating differences.
